contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox album| <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = Zücker | Type = [[Album]] | Artist = [[Fastbacks]] | Cover = Zucker_album.jpg | Background = Orange | Released = 1993 | Recorded = | Genre = [[Punk rock|Punk]], [[indie rock|indie]] | Length = 33:02 | Label = [[Sub Pop]] | Producer = | Last album = ''[[Very, Very Powerful Motor]]''<br />(1990) | This album = ''Zucker''<br />(1993) | Next album = ''[[Answer the Phone, Dummy]]''<br />(1994) }} {{Album ratings | rev1 = [[Allmusic]] | rev1Score = {{Rating|4.5|5}} <ref>{{Allmusic|class=album|id=r60128}}</ref> }} '''''Zücker''''' is the fourth album by the [[Fastbacks]], released in 1993 on [[Sub Pop]]. The twelfth track, "Please Read Me" is a cover of a [[Bee Gees]] song from their 1967 album ''[[Bee Gees 1st]]''. ==Track listing== All songs written by [[Kurt Bloch]], except where noted. # "Believe Me Never" – 3:03 # "Gone to the Moon" – 1:50 # "Hung on a Bad Peg" – 1:46 # "Under the Old Lightbulb" – 1:35 # "Never Heard of Him" – 1:47 # "When I'm Old" – 3:37 # "All About Nothing" – 2:27 # "Bill Challenger" – 1:17 # "Parts" – 1:46 # "Kind of Game" – 2:35 # "They Don't Care" – 2:32 # "Please Read Me" ([[Barry Gibb]], [[Robin Gibb]]) – 2:06 # "Save Room for Me" – 3:13 # "That Was" – 3:08 ==Personnel== *[[Kim Warnick]] - Vocals, Bass *[[Kurt Bloch]] - Guitar *[[Lulu Gargiulo]] - Guitar *[[Rusty Willoughby]] - Drums ==References== {{Reflist}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Zucker (Album)}} [[Category:1993 albums]] [[Category:Fastbacks albums]]
